trans-unit.source: Provides <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> objects for each state of the **Help** button of a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window.
trans-unit.target: 針對多重文件介面 (MDI) 子視窗之 [說明] 按鈕的每個狀態提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiHelpButton> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the **Help** button of an MDI child window.
trans-unit.target: 每一個屬性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiHelpButton>類別會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>不同狀態的**協助**按鈕的 MDI 子視窗。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiHelpButton.Normal%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiHelpButton.Normal%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowMdiHelpButton1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementWindowMdiHelpButton1`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a visual style element that represents the **Help** button of a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window in the disabled state.
trans-unit.target: 取得視覺化樣式元素，表示處於停用狀態之多重文件介面 (MDI) 子視窗的 [說明] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> that represents the **Help** button of an MDI child window in the disabled state.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" />表示**協助**的 MDI 子視窗中停用狀態的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiHelpButton.Disabled%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiHelpButton.Disabled%2A>屬性以建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiHelpButton.Disabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiHelpButton.Disabled%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowMdiHelpButton4` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementWindowMdiHelpButton4`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.target: 取得視覺化樣式元素，表示處於作用中狀態之多重文件介面 (MDI) 子視窗的 [說明] 按鈕。

trans-unit.target: 取得視覺化樣式元素，表示處於正常狀態之多重文件介面 (MDI) 子視窗的 [說明] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Gets a visual style element that represents the **Help** button of a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window in the pressed state.
trans-unit.target: 取得視覺化樣式元素，表示處於按下狀態之多重文件介面 (MDI) 子視窗的 [說明] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> that represents the **Help** button of an MDI child window in the pressed state.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" />表示**協助**的 MDI 子視窗中按下狀態的按鈕。
